metadata.title: 5188-1 -- Keepalived vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Keepalived incorrectly handled certain messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access-control bypass.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5188-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  keepalived - 1:2.1.5-0.2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
